abstract: Librado Romero has spent the past few weeks staking out New York after dark, producing a series of images imbued with a depth of emotion known only to a true lover of the city's streets.
snippet: Librado Romero has spent the past few weeks staking out New York after dark, producing a series of images imbued with a depth of emotion known only to a true lover of the city's streets.
lead_paragraph: There is a certain tender melancholy in the air, cloaked in shadows and soft light, as the city winds down. Revelers squeezing the last thrills from a night on the town. Lovers walking slowly hand in hand, before they kiss, part and vanish home. A solitary figure in a subway car as it rattles uptown.
